msg: SOLR-4751: fix replication problem of files in sub directory of conf

author: stevenbethard
msg: Makes CopyFromGold only remove exact class matches. So, for example, copying EventMentions from gold will only remove any existing EventMentions, not subclasses like ProcedureMention. Fixes EventAnnotator accordingly to account for this change.

author: rec
msg: [UIMA-2890] process() methods should not be in AnalysisEngineFactory
